channel.title: Spawning items in Quest Panel?
channel.description:
Well I added in the code to spawn items from the Quest Tab, it all compiles, it it works when you click it. Only problem is that the text won't show up on the Quest Tab, it is all blank area, but if I click around, it will spawn the items. Any idea of what I did wrong? I'm thinking it's something in the setString methods?
Pictures :: [IMG]http://i466.photobucket.com/albums/rr25/chawk_norris/help.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i466.photobucket.com/albums/rr25/chawk_norris/help1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i466.photobucket.com/albums/rr25/chawk_norris/help2.jpg[/img]

Well I added in the code to spawn items from the Quest Tab, it all compiles, it it works when you click it. Only problem is that the text won’t show up on the Quest Tab, it is all blank area, but if I click around, it will spawn the items.
Any idea of what I did wrong? I’m thinking it’s something in the setString methods?
